**As a** [Role]<br>
**I need** [Function]<br>
**So that** [Benefit]<br>

### Details and Assumptions<br>
-[Document what you know]<br>

### Acceptance Criteria:<br>
Given [Some context]<br>
When [Certain action is taken]<br>
Then [The outcome of action is observed]
